mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Divo, we're committed to making healthcare more accessible, transparent, and personalized. We believe that everyone deserves easy access to quality healthcare services, regardless of where they live.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded in 2020, Divo began as a small startup with a big vision. After experiencing the difficulties of navigating the healthcare system firsthand, our founders set out to create a platform that simplifies the healthcare journey for everyone involved.

timeline.title: The Beginning
timeline.description: Divo was established with the vision of transforming healthcare access

timeline.title: Initial Growth
timeline.description: Expanded our network to include over 100 healthcare providers

timeline.title: Technological Advancements
timeline.description: Launched our AI-powered symptom checker and telemedicine platform

timeline.title: Global Expansion
timeline.description: Extended our services to multiple countries and languages

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We're a diverse group of healthcare professionals, technologists, and passionate innovators working together to transform healthcare.

members.name: Dr. Sophia Chen
members.bio: With over 15 years of clinical experience, Dr. Chen ensures all medical aspects of our platform meet the highest standards.

members.name: Michael Rodriguez
members.bio: Michael brings 20+ years of tech leadership to Divo, previously leading development at major health tech companies.

members.name: Amara Okafor
members.bio: Amara's background in healthcare administration helps ensure Divo runs smoothly and efficiently.
